74
THE DUTIES OF WITNESSES TO A NUNCUPATIVE WILL
(1) The witnesses before which a testator has orally declared his or her will shall without delay be obliged to write the testator's statement and submit it to a court as soon as possible or orally repeat it in court, adding when, where, and under what circumstances the testator declared his or her will.
(2) Fulfilment of this obligation shall not be a condition for the validity of a nuncupative will.
